name: RestartAbTest
description:
Rerun a previous A/B test to gain new insights.

Use this tool to rerun an A/B test on your HubSpot CMS site pages. It should be called when you want to repeat a previous test for additional insights or validation of results.

parameters.name: test_variation_id
parameters.description: ID of the object to reactivate as a test variation for the A/B test.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to reactivate as a test variation.

parameters.name: ab_test_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the A/B test you wish to rerun on your HubSpot CMS site pages.

value_schema.description: ID of the test to rerun.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: variationId
parameters.description: ID of the object to reactivate as a test variation.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to reactivate as a test variation.

parameters.name: abTestId
parameters.description: ID of the test to rerun.

value_schema.description: ID of the test to rerun.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
